price: Rabbiin isa abaareera. Innis ni jedhe: “Ani gabroota kee irraa qooda murtaa’e nan qabadha.
arabic: لَّعَنَهُ ٱللَّهُۘ وَقَالَ لَأَتَّخِذَنَّ مِنۡ عِبَادِكَ نَصِيبٗا مَّفۡرُوضٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: laʿanahu al-lahu waqāla la-attakhidhanna min ʿibādika naṣīban mafrūḍan
